items.content_html: `Text-Util` is a lightweight text utility web app designed for quick tasks. Count characters and words, switch text between uppercase and lowercase, and effortlessly extract email addresses from input text. Simplify your text processing needs with this user-friendly tool.
items.title: ArnavMakode/Text-Util: `Text-Util` is a lightweight text utility web app designed for quick tasks. Count characters and words, switch text between uppercase and lowercase, and effortlessly extract email addresses from input text. Simplify your text processing needs with this user-friendly tool.
